headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINBENDER, ALVIN H

snippet: EINBENDER--Alvin H. The trustees, faculty, and staff of NYU Langone Medical Center mourn the loss of Alvin H. Einbender, an overseer and member of NYU Langone's Board of Trustees since 1994. His presence as a longtime board member will be greatly missed, and we remain deeply grateful for his generous support and commitment over many years. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife, Joan, their four children, 10 grandchildren, and the entire family. Kenneth G. Langone, Chair, Board of Trustees; Robert I. Grossman, MD, Dean and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: EINBENDER--Alvin H. The trustees, faculty, and staff of NYU Langone Medical Center mourn the loss of Alvin H. Einbender, an overseer and member of NYU Langone's Board of Trustees since 1994. His presence as a longtime board member will be greatly missed, and we remain deeply grateful for his generous support and commitment over many years. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife, Joan, their four children, 10 grandchildren, and the entire family. Kenneth G. Langone, Chair, Board of Trustees; Robert I. Grossman, MD, Dean and CEO 1/3
